Welcome to Wooden House Escape Up - a cool escape game!

Do you think you have the skills with Wooden House Escape Up - a cool escape game?


Wooden House Escape is a point and click escape game developed by Bamvd Games. You and your friends organized a party in your Wooden house. After party everyone left. When you wake up, you got shocked by seeing your house is being locked. Find some hidden object and to solve some interesting clues to escape from your Wooden House. Good luck…Have fun!!


Wooden House Escape is the newest point and click house escape game developed by Bamvd Games for an awesome new adventure and escape fun!

Today, you prepared your guest house for a great party that’s going-down here tonight! Man, this is gonna be so much fun! After the preparation, your guesthouse looks as cute ever, and after awhile, the festivities commenced.
Everyone had a great time, exchanging conversations, had a few drinks, and overall entertaining themselves. Unfortunately for you however, you fell deep into sleep after drinking so much and there you are, missing the party you organized.

Day-break came and man, what a hangover you have! But that’s not the worst thing that had happened however, you found your guests all gone and the doors locked jammed! What did they freaking do!? Man, those guys are not coming here again. Well anyways, you must try and figure a way out of here before you find more things that could top the bad things around here. Good luck!


Game features:

• Genuine story!
• Innovative puzzles!
• Stunning graphics!
• Realistic atmosphere!
• Tricky and challenging puzzles!
• Gorgeous graphics !
• No signup's required, just download and install!
